name: Cabin Fever (ChrisD_117)
description:
You've been stuck inside your cabin for too long. You need to get some fresh air, but there's one problem - zombies roam the area! Traverse the snowy mountain and eliminate all the zombies so you can finally get some peace and quiet. This project was created through the Games and Interactive Media major at Azusa Pacific University. 

INSTRUCTIONS

Download, unzip, and launch the application to play!

  • Mouse + WASD to move
  • Shift to run
  • Space to jump
  • Left mouse button to shoot
  • Right mouse button to zoom
  • Numbers 1-3 to change weapons
